text:
(1)
Outerbridge Crossing: A view north from the foot of Lee Avenue, Tottenville, Staten Island. The bridge connects Staten Island with Perth Amboy, New Jersey.
April 23, 1929

P. L. Sperr

(2)
Another view, at a later date, looking up Arthur Kill.
June 25, 1935

P. L. Sperr

(3)
An additional view, at a still later date.
June 6, 1936

P. L. Sperr
title: Bridges - Outerbridge Crossing site - [Linking Tottenville, Staten Island to Perth Amboy, New Jersey.]
